title: Establishment of Colombo Metropolitan City Corporation
decision_details:
- with a view to assist to local bodies within the Colombo City Region namely, Colombo Municipal Council, Dehiwala-Mt. Lavinia  Municipal Council, Kolonnawa Urban Council, Kotikawatta-Mulleriyawa Pradeshiya Sabha and Sri Jayewardenepura-Kotte  Municipal Council, a supervisory body by the name of  Colombo Metropolitan City Corporation is to be set up for the efficient management of the Colombo City Region.  While existing elected local bodies will continue to function, all Heads and Deputy Heads of the said five local authorities and a nominated member from the opposition of each local authority and officials of Ministries involved in the delivery of utilities and other services, Chief Secretary of the Western Provincial Council will constitute the composition of the City Corporation, which will be headed by the Governor of the Metropolitan Corporation.  Twelve Advisory Committees comprising of elected members of local bodies will be set up to advise the Corporation.  
	
The proposal made by Hon. A.L.M. Athaullah, Minister of Local Government and Provincial Councils, to instruct the Legal Draftsman to prepare legislation for presentation to Parliament accordingly, was approved by the Cabinet of Ministers.
